com.opower.connectionpool - package com.opower.connectionpool
 
ConnectionFactory - Interface in com.opower.connectionpool
A factory for creating connections for accessing and processing data stored in a data source (usually a relational database)
ConnectionPool - Interface in com.opower.connectionpool
Please see SQLConnectionPool implementation for details.
create() - Method in class com.opower.connectionpool.SQLConnectionPool
Opens a connection.

E

M

MAX_IS_VALID_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT - Static variable in class com.opower.connectionpool.SQLConnectionPool

R
